text: The Christian Union, Dutch: ChristenUnie (shortened CU), is a Dutch political party. The Christian Union is an orthodox Christian democratic party. It was established in 2001 as a merger of the Reformed Political Alliance (GPV) and the Reformatory Political Federation (RPF). Number of seats in the 2023 elections: 3 (-2). == Political leaders == * Kars Veling - 2001-2002 * Andr√© Rouvoet - 2002-2011 * Arie Slob - 2011-2015 * Gert-Jan Segers - 2015-2023 * Mirjam Bikker - 2023- == Other websites == * Website of the ChristianUnion Category:Christian democratic parties Category:Political parties in the Netherlands Category:Christianity in the Netherlands Category:2001 establishments in the Netherlands
title: Christian Union
